mapper.select: select * from jsoup.jsoup_mission_all_history mh where mh.mission_state = '1' order by mh.sent_time ASC limit 1

select jud.user_id userId, jma.ma_id orderId, jud.user_nick_name userNickName, jud.user_lever lever, ojm.mark_time sentTime, ojm.des commentDes, jud.user_des userDes, ojm.up_num upNum, ojm.down_num downNum, count(*) count
from jsoup.order_jsoup_ma ojm left join jsoup.jsoup_mission_all jma on jma.ma_id = ojm.ma_id left join jsoup.jsoup_user_detail jud on jud.user_id = ojm.owner_user_id where ojm.ma_id = #{maId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ojm.des != '' limit #{pre,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{last,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select jud.user_id userId, jma.mission_all_history_id orderId, jud.user_nick_name userNickName, jud.user_lever lever, ojm.mark_time sentTime, ojm.des commentDes, jud.user_des userDes, ojm.up_num upNum, ojm.down_num downNum, count(*) count
from jsoup.order_jsoup_mh ojm left join jsoup.jsoup_mission_all_history jma on jma.mission_all_history_id = ojm.mh_id left join jsoup.jsoup_user_detail jud on jud.user_id = ojm.owner_user_id where ojm.mh_id = #{maId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ojm.des != '' limit #{pre,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{last,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(0) from jsoup.jsoup_mission_all_history ma where ma.mission_state = '1'
